arts.ttl: Gasperini Reflects on Atalanta’s Hard-Fought Victory Against Como
arts.sum: Atalanta's recent Serie A match against Como ended in a 2-1 victory, with Mateo Retegui scoring both goals for the visiting team. The match, held at Stadio Giuseppe Sinigaglia, showcased Atalanta's resilience as they came back from an early deficit after Nico Paz opened the scoring for Como. arts.ttl: Serie A | Como 1-2 Atalanta: Match Report
arts.sum: Atalanta's Serie A campaign received a much-needed boost as their star striker Mateo Retegui netted twice to secure a 2-1 comeback win against Como. arts.sum: Inter Milan are setting their sights on Nico Paz, a 20-year-old Argentine-Spanish midfielder who has been making waves in Serie A with Como. The young talent has already impressed with two goals and four assists in just 15 games, catching the attention of top European clubs.
